_comment: Only replace the words on the right side of the =.
Do not touch the words on the left. Once translated, save the file as "<region>.lang". e.g. "en_gb.lang"
Replace the first line of this file with the new region.
Never replace characters, such as "§<letter>" as these are colours!
Please create a pull request here once complete: https://github.com/MSpaceDev/MonsterTotems/pulls
Make the title of the pull request, "Added <region> translation support"

tooltip.spirit_knife: A mysterious blade that seems to drop monster's spirits upon their death
tooltip.spirit_ingot: An unusual element that is created by smelting Spirit Powder
tooltip.carving_tool: Use on Infused Logs to carve them into Totem Heads
tooltip.spirit: Right click on a log to infuse this spirit into it
tooltip.missing: No information provided! Contact Mod Author!
tooltip.zombie_infused_log: Carve with the Carving Tool to create a Zombie Totem Head
tooltip.skeleton_infused_log: Carve with the Carving Tool to create a Skeleton Totem Head
tooltip.creeper_infused_log: Carve with the Carving Tool to create a Creeper Totem Head
tooltip.spider_infused_log: Carve with the Carving Tool to create a Spider Totem Head
tooltip.enderman_infused_log: Carve with the Carving Tool to create a Enderman Totem Head
tooltip.witch_infused_log: Carve with the Carving Tool to create a Witch Totem Head
tooltip.silverfish_infused_log: Carve with the Carving Tool to create a Silverfish Totem Head
tooltip.slime_infused_log: Carve with the Carving Tool to create a Slime Totem Head
tooltip.blaze_infused_log: Carve with the Carving Tool to create a Blaze Totem Head
tooltip.zombie_pigman_infused_log: Carve with the Carving Tool to create a Zombie Pigman Totem Head
tooltip.ghast_infused_log: Carve with the Carving Tool to create a Ghast Totem Head
tooltip.magma_cube_infused_log: Carve with the Carving Tool to create a Magma Cube Totem Head
tooltip.zombie_totem: Stops Zombies and Husks from spawning when placed on a totem base
tooltip.skeleton_totem: Stops Skeletons, Wither Skeletons and Strays from spawning when placed on a totem base
tooltip.creeper_totem: Stops Creepers from spawning when placed on a totem base
tooltip.spider_totem: Stops Spiders from spawning when placed on a totem base
tooltip.enderman_totem: Stops Endermen from spawning when placed on a totem base
tooltip.witch_totem: Stops Witches from spawning when placed on a totem base
tooltip.silverfish_totem: Stops Silverfish from spawning when placed on a totem base
tooltip.slime_totem: Stops Slimes from spawning when placed on a totem base
tooltip.blaze_totem: Stops Blazes from spawning when placed on a totem base
tooltip.zombie_pigman_totem: Stops Zombie Pigmen from spawning when placed on a totem base
tooltip.ghast_totem: Stops Ghasts from spawning when placed on a totem base
tooltip.magma_cube_totem: Stops Magma Cubes from spawning when placed on a totem base
tooltip.overworld_totem: Combines the effects of the Zombie, Skeleton, Creeper and Spider Totem Heads
tooltip.nether_totem: Combines the effects of the Blaze, Ghast, Zombie Pigman and Magma Cube Totem Heads
tooltip.unnatural_totem: Combines the effects of the Enderman, Witch, Silverfish and Slime Totem Heads
tooltip.master_totem: Stops all monsters from spawning §o(Even modded ones)
tooltip.totem_base: Required for totem heads to work and determines affected radius
base.no_active_heads: §cThere are no totem heads above the base.
